meta.@content: This prototype performs raising and lowering front wheels and axle. The clickable axle triggers an animation based on the boolean.
front wheels prototype, gear up and down
An experimental version of X3D JSON encoding is used for this scene.  Status online at http://www.web3d.org/wiki/index.php/X3D_JSON_Encoding

field.@appinfo: boolean eventIn: true = wheels up false = wheels down.
eventIn: boolean true: wheels up false: wheels down

@string: click on this text and view
